Summary: it was like a long shiny smooth metallic object
divs: Sighting Detailsme and all of our college friends were in a fireld having one of the biggest parties and me and two other people went of tohave a threesome for the first time and all of the sudden we heard a wierdnoise, we thought it was one of us but then the two guys started to make out andi noticed that there was a strange object in the air. they both stopped whatthey were doing and watched for a few minutes , and then it flew off.
